${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> The secret to mitigating DDoS attacks Application note: Volumetric DDoS mitigation With DDoS attacks continuing to increase in magnitude, frequency and sophistication, it’s critical to come up with a cost-effective, scalable and adaptable defense strategy. What is the first step in defending your customers, content and infrastructure safe? Would you believe it’s the IP network?
It’s true. In fact, the IP network plays a critical role as the first line of defense against volumetric DDoS attacks that represent over 99% of attack volumes.
If you’re serious about mitigating DDoS attacks, you’ll want to read this application note.
In the paper, you’ll:
- Learn about the most popular DDoS attack vectors and how they operate
- Explore how to detect and mitigate attacks through proactive measures
- Discover how Nokia’s DDoS mitigation capabilities can keep your infrastructure safe Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
